body.name: Saiyin Passive Bookshelf Speakers for Desktop Stereo or Home Theater Surround Sound, 3.5-Inch Woofer with Horn Tweeter, 2-Way Passive Near-Field Monitor Speakers, Wall Mountable,Without Speaker Wire
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 50 mins
features: 【Classic Wooden Bookshelf Speakers】Bookshelf speaker with wooden cabinets adds an extra layer of depth and richness to the sound, creating an immersive listening experience. The solid construction of the all-wood MDF cabinet ensures it will withstand years of use, while the minimalist and sleek design in black woodgrain makes it perfect fit for any home or office.𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐩𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐬𝐩𝐞𝐚𝐤𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐝𝐨𝐞𝐬 𝐍𝐎𝐓 𝐈𝐍𝐂𝐋𝐔𝐃𝐄 𝐒𝐏𝐄𝐀𝐊𝐄𝐑 𝐖𝐈𝐑𝐄 𝐂𝐀𝐁𝐋𝐄𝐒 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐃𝐨𝐞𝐬 𝐍𝐨𝐭 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐁𝐥𝐮𝐞𝐭𝐨𝐨𝐭𝐡.

【Silk Square Horn Tweeter】The passive speaker incorporates a horn tweeter that ensures clear and crisp high-frequency sound.The silk square horn tweeter achieves an even distribution of sound throughout the listening area. It delivers a natural sonic character, ensuring that every note and beat is delivered with crystal-clear precision.

【3.5-Inch Woofer Driver for Deep, Stable Bass】This 3.5-inch low-frequency speaker achieves usable bass extension down to 60Hz,which provides greater flexibility in the types of music it can handle, and also produces more dynamic and punchy sound with clear and accurate reproduction of lower frequencies.

【Engineered for Great Sound】With a peak power of 2×25W, these passive speakers deliver a robust and room-filling sound.Whether you're watching movies,listening to music,or playing games, the speakers provide a satisfying level of volume and clarity,allowing you to fully enjoy your favorite media.Their enhanced audio capability makes them a great fit with a wide range of usage such as bookshelf speakers,center channel speakers, or use with optional wall mount brackets as surround sound speakers.

【Thoughtful Design】The passive speakers are designed for the budget-conscious music lover who wants a pair of simple, affordable, yet great sounding speakers. These speakers can be used on desks, bookshelves or walls, or on speaker stands.The independent hooks on the back panel to facilitate you to hang the speakers on the wall. 𝐈𝐌𝐏𝐎𝐑𝐓𝐀𝐍𝐓 𝐍𝐎𝐓𝐄:𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐛𝐨𝐨𝐤𝐬𝐡𝐞𝐥𝐟 𝐬𝐩𝐞𝐚𝐤𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐩𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐫𝐞𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐫𝐞 𝐚 𝐬𝐞𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐚𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐞𝐫 𝐨𝐫 𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐞𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐢𝐧 𝐨𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐫 𝐭𝐨 𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐲 𝐚𝐮𝐝𝐢𝐨 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐚 𝐓𝐕, 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐫, 𝐨𝐫 𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐨𝐫𝐝 𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐞𝐫.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specifications of Passive Speakers (DS6700M) Woofer size 3.5 inch Tweeter size 0.5 inch Frequency Response 60Hz~20KHz Speaker Type Passive speakers (No Bluetooth Function) Rated power 5~25W SPL 75dB Impendance 4 ohms Connectivity Technology Need speaker wire connect (Not include speaker wire)

IMPORTANT NOTE The passive speakers Does not support Bluetooth.The passive speakers require a separate amplifier or receiver in order to play audio from a TV, computer, or record player.The passive speakers do not include remote control and speaker wires.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars incredible for the price, work great as computer speakers (add subwoofer for lows)
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these bookshelf speakers as desk speakers for my home computer setup, both for listening to music or to take meetings via speaker when I can (headphone meetings are more tiring than one thinks).Of course, there is no low-end with this setup due to the nature of the size of the housing as well as the size of the speaker. I added a subwoofer to the system and am VERY happy with audio quality.The price seems unbeatable, and I am actually surprised with the quality and look of the housing for the $$. I removed the brand sticker from the cover, which is very easy,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superb performance when paired with a good amp
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed how these $40 speakers stacked up against some of my DYI bookshelf builds that have drivers and components that cost way more than this pair of speakers.I hooked up the Saiyins to a 2.1 FOSI bluetooth mini amp and a DYI 5.5 inch subwoofer and am simply delighted with the outcome: a very good bookshelf system under $ 200!!! Thank you Saiyin. I will order more units for future projects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works ok, as a very picky person, sound is ok for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used these speakers as rear surround speakers in my system. They are being powered by a Rockfish unit. They sound great and work perfectly with my stands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little desktop speakers. Sleek clean look. Overall sound decent for $50.
reviews.reviewText: Pretty happy with these desk speakers. They're small, don't expect bass. They're decent enough though for basic stuff and a little music or listening to video. Overall sounds decent for $50. Sounds fine both horizontal or vertical. Super easy to drive with low power. Really clean look to them. If you need bass, add a little sub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Value and great sound
reviews.reviewText: I use it to pair with my old AV receiver in the garage, which serves as the home gym. It's amazing how well the speakers are able to pump out the sound in high volume without much distortion. The bass is solid for its size. Money well spent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pair to be installed as rear speakers. The sound is really good. Highly recommendable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprised at the quality of these speakers
reviews.reviewText: 2 of my Klipsch speakers went out on the front. These have replaced them nicely, very good sound. Played music turned up and they did not distort. Very happy with them
